reviews.review_msg: Stacy is one of the best professors I have ever had. She genuinely wants her students to grapple with difficult questions and will take your concerns seriously. Plus, she has a great sense of humor, is approachable, and brilliant. If you are interested and enthusiastic about contemporary concerns in anthropology, take Stacy's class.
Absolutely fantastic! She is a personable person and gives the same curtsies to you. Work hard and you'll do fine. :)
